features: COMPOSTABLE DRYER SHEETS FOR BABIES - Naturally soften fabric, reduce static cling and wrinkles, and freshen up clothing with a pleasant scent for babies age 0-4 months

NATURAL LAUNDRY SUPPLIES FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Our naturally-derived, plant-based formula is made without animal derivatives, phthalates, harsh chemicals, dyes, wax, fats, or other harmful active ingredients
BEST DRYER AND FABRIC SOFTENER SHEETS FOR PARENTS - Grab Green Newborn Baby Dryer Sheets are essential laundry supplies that leave your clothes fresh, soft, and free of wrinkles or static
CALMING CHAMOMILE SCENT - Use this scented dryer sheet formulated with essential oils like cedarwood, citronella java, geranium, orange, patchouli, and petitgrain to soothe and calm fussy newborns

CRUELTY-FREE LAUNDRY SHEETS - Grab Green plant and mineral-based dryer sheets are premium clothing refreshers made in the USA with high quality, responsibly-sourced ingredients that are never tested on animals
body.description: Sustainably-sourced and compostable, Grab Green Newborn Baby Dryer Sheets naturally soften clothing and linens, and reduce static cling without unnecessary dyes, phthalates, wax or animal-derived ingredients. Our soft, Calming Chamomile scent is made with cedarwood, citronella java, geranium, orange, patchouli and petitgrain essential oils. Designed to perfectly pair in load size and fragrance to our Grab Green Newborn Baby Laundry Detergent Pods; equal load sizes saves you money; same fragrance ensures the pleasant scent carries through to the dry cycle. We responsibly source the highest quality plant and mineral-based ingredients and work directly with our team of organic chemists to create the most effective, naturally-derived, non-toxic formulas. Our thoughtful packaging includes clear use instructions and we believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. Grab Green is a female and mother owned and operated company that provides naturally derived and non-toxic laundry, home cleaning, and personal care products 100% made in the USA. Our products are eco-responsible and ensure safe and effective cleaning power for a healthy, happy home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our philosophy simply! Cleaning is not only about what you remove, but what you add as well. As a mother of two daughters and two furry four-legged doggies, having a safe and healthy home was always Patricia Spencer’s top priority. She set out to craft Grab Green’s signature eco-responsible and family-safe formulas to not only do the job well, but offer a truly delightful experience. Trusted, go-to products. We’re all for that! Grab Green Newborn and Baby Dryer Sheets Grab Green’s Newborn & Baby Dryer Sheets are specifically formulated for each stage of your baby’s life. Newborn Baby Dryer Sheets are recommended for Newborns 0-4 months and will enhance your baby’s linens and clothing with its Calming Chamomile fragrance. Baby Dryer Sheets are recommended for 5+ months of age and will enhance your baby’s linens and clothing with its Dreamy Rosewood fragrance. Formulated to soften clothing and reduce static cling. Made with naturally-derived ingredients Laundry Pods: formulated for high efficiency (HE) & standard washing machines; Works for all temperatures Newborn Calming Chamomile—contains essential oils; cedarwood, citronella java, geranium, mandarin, orange, patchouli & petitgrain Baby Dreamy Rosewood—contains essential oils: lemon and patchouli Laundry Pods: made without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, dyes or optical brighteners. Dryer Sheets: made without wax, animal derivatives, phthalates or dyes. Made in the USA with domestic and imported components.

Layers of Safety Powder pods don’t resemble candy; Bitrex outer film; made with naturally-derived ingredients; very difficult to swallow. Contains Bitrex The most bitter substance in the world, responsible manufacturers & retailers add Bitrex to household products as a safety ingredient. True Transparency We believe in full ingredient disclosure which is why we list every ingredient on our packaging, along with its purpose. Superior, Responsibly Sourced Ingredients We choose higher quality plant & mineral ingredients & practice advanced green chemistry to achieve formulas that result in the best cleaning products available. Layers of Safety Eco-Responsible True Transparency Responsibly Sourced Ingredients

Baby Dryer Sheets Diaper Pail Odor Removal Spray Baby Laundry Detergent Powder Pods Baby Bottle & Dish Soap Newborn Baby Laundry Detergent Pods Newborn Baby Laundry Dryer Sheets Naturally-Derived Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-Toxic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Effective Formula ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Animal Testing and Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Sulfate & Paraben Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Patricia's Tips Tip 1 Avoid choking hazards: when folding baby’s clean clothing, inspect items to ensure sure no buttons/snaps, or embellishments came loose. Tip 2 Concerned about stains becoming permanent? Be sure to wash smaller loads frequently to prevent stains from setting. Tip 3 What’s the ideal temperature for washing baby’s clothing? Hot water for diapers, warm for everything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Has very pleasant smell for the baby clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE SMELL IS UNPARALLELED!
reviews.reviewText: I would buy every single scent this company offers in every form. They have cracked the fragrance code! It’s all super luscious and craveable! I wash my toddlers stuffies with these and she snuggles them like crazy afterward!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use hypoallergenic unscented detergent so not all the smells leave.This dryer sheet has a very thick papery texture but these smell great. It barely leaves a smell on my clean clothes after being run in the dryer, but it’s better than no scent at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great smell, but wish it had transferred the smell more
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with the smell but disappointed that the clothes didn’t smell more like the dryer sheets after using. I used them generously so they should have transferred the smell well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smelling for baby clothes!
reviews.reviewText: We love how these make our baby clothes smell. I wash in Tide Free and Clear and put 2 of these in the dryer and they come out smelling amazing and feeling so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me preface my review by stating my son does not have sensitive skin, detergents, lotions, soaps, nothing has ever bothered him so I felt very comfortable and confident trying something new like these dryer sheets to bring a little more freshness to his laundry. Though these are pricey compared to other dryer sheets on the market I love that they are made with essential oils, made in the USA, cruelty free, natural, I could go on and on! In fact my husband noticed how good the baby's laundry smelled that we stared to you use these on all of our laundry! Also tip don't throw away after one use! I have noticed the sheets retain their scent after several loads!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked well. I just hated the scent.
reviews.reviewText: These worked well. To me the scent was unbearable. I was hoping to find non toxic dryer sheets with a pleasant scent. I had to return them because I couldn't even stand to have them in my laundry room. That being said, clothes dried with them were not overly scented. A lot of it seemed to dissapate during the drying process. I think the unscented ones are likely great. I would be willing to try a different scent if they come out with another version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They smell amazing
reviews.reviewText: These work well and you can easily tear them half. Perfect.
